text: 8.35: Ro 8.38-39Krais, ana guigira won ndavara nza nɨɨŋgi. Mba vuzvuk, ana guigi guarara za nzan ki, bigɨn the ana vuzvuga thugɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Maaŋ muuŋgip, simtɨk nzan hɨrga o, nza maaŋ muuŋgip zaa ndirga o, harigi gumgi tɨvi mbatɨgir nzan muunga o, nza thi hɨrga o, nza shagi ga sosuagirga o, bigɨna mbatɨga thueŋ nzan hɨr saŋv muunga o, mbe nza shogiri nza vhɨzɨrga. Mba bigi, nta Krais vuzvuga thugɨrie? Zakɨra fhuvara!
